channel.title: Comments on: Rose Mansion – 400 South Grand Avenue

item.title: By: Brian Alan Baaker
item.dc:creator: Brian Alan Baaker
item.description: <p>Good introduction to an extraordinary citrus grower. “Sunny Slope” appears as a city (with its own rail stop) on maps from the last quarter of the 19th century.</p> <p> </p>
item.content:encoded: Good introduction to an extraordinary citrus grower. “Sunny Slope” appears as a city (with its own rail stop) on maps from the last quarter of the 19th century.
